column4: Hey all - im just wondering if any one knows why i cannot connect to the internet from kernel 2.6.15-25 but i can from kernel 2.6.15-23
does your nic work at all with?
- no - it wont ping my router
isn't that a restricted driver aswell?
did you bould that module allready with your last kernel, cause you need to do that every time when you update your kernel
have you installed your restricted drivers? sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-`uname -r`
eehm, thats the command if you're in your buggy kernel btw
yes you do need it, but you can install it with your other kernel, just exec the command, copy the line and install it with the -25 change
sorry dunno then, search the bugzilla and report a new bug if you can't find anything about it
- can i remove that kernel and reinstall it ? or is that difficult ?
